basics.name: Faeze Ghorbanpour
basics.label: Machine Learning Researcher
basics.summary: Highly motivated machine learning researcher with a particular focus on natural language processing, efficient transfer learning and computational social science.

work.name: Sotoon Company
work.summary: As a member of the NLP team at the Sotoon Company's AI division, I worked on many NLP tasks, analyzing, modeling, and classifying. Most of the products we offer are commissioned by other businesses (B2B), such as comment rejector (Auto reject), ticket auto-answering (Auto reply), and automatic text classification (Auto ML).

work.name: Shaya Smart Solutions
work.summary: I was a member of the NLP team at this firm and worked on Persian language processing products, such as a Persian verb analyzer and a text extractor from PDF files, and these projects are currently supporting other larger services being undertaken by the company.

honors.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
honors.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
